gr.interamerican.bo2.odftoolkit.utils
Class ExpressionEvaluator

java.lang.Object
  gr.interamerican.bo2.odftoolkit.utils.ExpressionEvaluator

public class ExpressionEvaluator
extends java.lang.Object

Evaluates OGNL expressions against a model object.

isTolerateErrors

public boolean isTolerateErrors()
Gets the tolerateOgnlErrors. If this property is true, then if an error occurs during the evaluation of an OGNL expression, the exception will not be thrown and the OGNL expression will be evaluated to an empty string.

Returns:
Returns the tolerateOgnlErrors

setTolerateErrors

public void setTolerateErrors(boolean tolerateOgnlErrors)
Assigns a new value to the tolerateOgnlErrors.
